interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Beauty Glazed Gorgeous Me Eyeshadow Palette Matte Professional 63 Colors Eyeshadow Cosmetic Matte Eyeshadow Cream +Makeup Brushes Set and Powder Blender Sponge Review Date: 2018/09/05 Store: Beauty Glazed Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Color': 'B37-63 Shades', 'Brand': 'Beauty Glazed', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.79 x 3.9 x 0.59 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '711796032686', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Glazed'} Review Text: This palette doesn't have all the qualities of a high end eyeshadow palette, but it is one of the best low cost palettes I've gotten before.
I love the range and variety of colors in this palette. All of the shimmers are highly pigmented and the matted come out great on the eye. The more vibrant shimmers do have a lot of fallout so I'd suggest using a shadow shield or doing your foundation and concealer after so you can cover it up. Also I would highly recommend using your finger or a sponge tip brush to apply the shimmers and pack on the color. Review Title: Great Budget Friendly Palette Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Advanced vitamin C serum with natural Antioxidant for fine lines and wrinkles Firm and Youthful formula by Essy Essy ['Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum is the natural way to obtain younger looking skin without any harsh chemicals.', "Vitamin C is known for its anti-oxidant properties that are powerful and effective in repairing and protecting skin from UV damage and pollutants. It's an industry recognized ingredient that diminishes years of wrinkles and fine lines for a smoother and more beautiful complexion.", 'Benefits:', '-Reverse UV damage -Lighten dark spots and acne scars -Repair skin -Reduce wrinkles and fine lines -Prevent further hyper pigmentation -Increase collagen production -Even out skin tone -Prevent acne breakouts -Gentle enough for sensitive skin', 'Directions:', 'Cleanse and dry your face and neck. After toner, massage a small amount of Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum to your face, neck and décolleté until fully absorbed. Follow with your regular moisturizer. For best results, we recommend using this serum every night before bedtime.', 'Caution:', 'For external use only. Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Patch test on skin before first use. If skin irritation occurs, stop use. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Please store in a cool place.'] {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Essy', 'Unit Count': '1.02 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3.1 x 1.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '736631212993'} I've been using this serum twice a week for the last 3 weeks and my skin feels great.
Almost immediately after putting it on my pores become visibly smaller. The discoloration and redness on my cheeks and forehead are much less visible in the morning if I use it at night.
This serum works just as well as the high-end ones and is at a much more reasonable price.
I'm definitely recommending this brand to all my friends. Great Inexpensive Serum Beauty Glazed Gorgeous Me Eyeshadow Palette Matte Professional 63 Colors Eyeshadow Cosmetic Matte Eyeshadow Cream +Makeup Brushes Set and Powder Blender Sponge Beauty Glazed {'Color': 'B37-63 Shades', 'Brand': 'Beauty Glazed', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.79 x 3.9 x 0.59 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '711796032686', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Glazed'} This palette doesn't have all the qualities of a high end eyeshadow palette, but it is one of the best low cost palettes I've gotten before.
I love the range and variety of colors in this palette. All of the shimmers are highly pigmented and the matted come out great on the eye. The more vibrant shimmers do have a lot of fallout so I'd suggest using a shadow shield or doing your foundation and concealer after so you can cover it up. Also I would highly recommend using your finger or a sponge tip brush to apply the shimmers and pack on the color. Great Budget Friendly Palette
profile:
**User Profile Summary Updated:**

- **Skincare Focus:** User prioritizes effective skincare products targeting signs of aging, such as fine lines and wrinkles, while also showing an interest in cosmetics that enhance beauty.
- **Ingredient Preference:** Favors natural, chemical-free formulations in skincare, with a notable interest in Vitamin C for its antioxidant and skin repair benefits. The user has also demonstrated an openness to experimenting with makeup products that offer variety and creativity.
- **Product Performance:** Values products that visibly improve skin texture, tone, reduce redness or discoloration, and appreciates high pigmentation in makeup for vibrant application.
- **Application Habits:** Consistently uses skincare products (twice weekly) and applies makeup in a methodical manner to ensure optimal results, specifically recommending techniques for better application.
- **Value-Based Purchasing:** Looks for high-quality products at reasonable prices, often comparing with high-end alternatives. Recent interactions indicate an appreciation for budget-friendly options in cosmetics.
- **Recommendation Tendencies:** Likely to recommend effective beauty products to friends, reflecting a social aspect in their shopping habits, including both skincare and makeup.
- **Skin Type:** Prefers products suited for dry skin, enjoys gentle formulations safe for sensitive skin, and appreciates versatile products that complement both skincare and cosmetic routines.

Overall, user maintains a clear trend towards enhancing appearance through quality, effective products without compromising on ingredient integrity or budget.
